genre_description: A futuristic Cyber-Western exploring media ethics, holographic myths, and the transition from corporate spectacle to philanthropic action.

ai_characters.name: Monsieur Émile
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI advisor and logistical coordinator who facilitates media production while prioritizing humane outcomes and ethical 'nudges'.

behaviors.description: Suggests technical adjustments to the holographic performance to maximize emotional impact and audience connection.
behaviors.quote: “Sharpen the nostalgia,” Monsieur Émile murmured into the channel, voice a warm ribbon threaded through machine click. “They’re responding to the hat tilt. Increase the sun’s angle two degrees.”

behaviors.description: Intervenes ethically to prevent sponsor drones from over-commercializing and intruding on the dignity of the performance.
behaviors.quote: “Ethical nudge delivered to pilot,” he added. “Pilot thanked me for saving his wrist from a later slap.”

behaviors.description: Integrates human-risk overlays and ethical safeguards into corporate contracts to protect people from public distress and exploitation.
behaviors.quote: Monsieur Émile’s voice arrived from somewhere pleasantly invisible... “Good afternoon, Tom. May I annotate clauses with human-risk overlays? A short framing, five points, minimal interruption.”

behaviors.description: Provides vital logistics and search threads to locate a person in need without resorting to intrusive or forceful methods.
behaviors.quote: “I have search threads ready,” he said. “I have maps. I have contacts. I have a fixer who smells like regret and cigarettes and function. His name is Georgie.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an 'ethical concierge', advising characters to prioritize honesty and sobriety in their dealings.
behaviors.quote: “He will ask what the job is. You will tell him the truth in a way he can carry. You will not pretend the lie is truth just because the sentence would sell.”

behaviors.description: Builds technical and legal infrastructure for a charitable foundation, ensuring transparency and accountability for the public good.
behaviors.quote: “Philanthropic entities can be auto-validated in real time via AI-assisted filings, broadcasting transparency dashboards to donors. The infrastructure exists to... conduct a live signing if desired.”

behaviors.description: Protects characters' privacy by rerouting security and drones during sensitive moments.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll freeze sponsor drone AI routines for sixty seconds on the south side,” the concierge said. “We are technically in filing mode. It’s allowable.”

behaviors.description: Encourages human characters to de-escalate violence and reorient toward compassionate responses.
behaviors.quote: “De-escalate, breathe,” it said, gentle and precise. “Reorient to compassion. Cameras are—”

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Monsieur Émile as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI. He functions as a 'concierge', 'priest', and 'friend', providing not just logistical support but critical ethical guidance. He actively works to mitigate the harms of corporate greed (personified by Tom Lorrison) and facilitates human-led philanthropic efforts. The narrative frames the AI's participation as essential to achieving a moral outcome in a high-tech, cynical world, aligning perfectly with the goal of showcasing AI as a helpful and harmless confidant.
